Deficiency Narrative: The operations recreational activities log does not include daily indoor and outdoor activity options.
Correction Narrative: The operation has updated their recreational activities calendar to meet compliance with indoor and outdoor activities.

Deficiency Narrative: Two of the Two children's records reviewed were missing admission's assessments.
Correction Narrative:
The Professional Level Service Provider and treatment director are responsible for completing these tasks and will ensure that all forms are completed within the appropriate time frame, printed, shared, signed, dated, and placed in the individual childs binder.
Westlake House LLC corrective action plan is to assign the Lead/Supervisor the task of auditing each individual childs binder weekly or until completion to ensure that all required documents are filed in the binder. The lead/supervisor will provide an audit sheet to the licensed administrator with the status of each childs binder.
In the event there are missing documents, the lead/supervisor will email the professional level service provider, administrator, and treatment director requesting documents to ensure missing documents are secured immediately.
